TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TreeNodeMouseClickEventArgs extends System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs

summary.span: 提供 和 事件的資料。

span.span: Provides data for the and events.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何處理事件，以及如何使用。The following code example demonstrates how to handle the event and how to use the . 若要執行此範例中，將程式碼貼到 Windows 表單，其中包含名為`treeView1`。To run this example, paste the code into a Windows Form that contains a named `treeView1`. 填入`treeView1`位於檔案的名稱`c:\`系統，執行此範例的目錄，並關聯事件`treeView1`使用`treeView1_NodeMouseDoubleClick`在此範例中的方法。Populate `treeView1` with the names of files located in the `c:\` directory of the system the sample is running on, and associate the event of `treeView1` with the `treeView1_NodeMouseDoubleClick` method in this example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewWhidbeyMembers#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewWhidbeyMembers/cpp/Form1.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewWhidbeyMembers#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewWhidbeyMembers/CS/Form1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewWhidbeyMembers#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewWhidbeyMembers/VB/Form1.vb#5)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何處理事件，以及如何使用。The following code example demonstrates how to handle the event and how to use the . 若要執行此範例中，將程式碼貼到 Windows 表單，其中包含名為`treeView1`。To run this example, paste the code into a Windows Form that contains a named `treeView1`. 填入`treeView1`位於檔案的名稱`c:\`系統，執行此範例的目錄，並關聯事件`treeView1`使用`treeView1_NodeMouseDoubleClick`在此範例中的方法。Populate the `treeView1` with the names of files located in the `c:\` directory of the system the sample is running on, and associate the event of `treeView1` with the `treeView1_NodeMouseDoubleClick` method in this example.
